name: OwnLocal, Inc.
description: Provider of automated digital advertising platform designed to offer the latest in automated advertising, mobile, and syndication technology. The company's digital advertising platform offers AdForge, which automatically converts newspapers print display advertisement into SEO-friendly online ads and other sophisticated digital marketing campaigns, enabling clients to advertise at a broader scale.
